description: Tatsuma, Kyouichi and Aoi`s homeroom teacher. She can be very childish as a teacher, often screaming at the students and throwing stuff at them. She is often annoyed by Kyouichi, who calls her Maria-chan and always comes up with excuses to skip class. Though her attitude doesn`t show it, she cares deeply for the safety of her students. She rides a motorcycle to school everyday and often speaks in English.
name: Maria Alucard
